ManSection.Returns: a list of records of the form rec(S, T, degree, level, name)
ManSection.Description: Constructs a list of all irreps of \mathrm{SL}_2(\mathbb{Z}) that are exactly the given degree and have prime power level.

ManSection.Returns: a list of records of the form rec(S, T, degree, level, name)
ManSection.Description: Constructs a list of all irreps of \mathrm{SL}_2(\mathbb{Z}) that are at most the given degree and have prime power level.

ManSection.Returns: a list of records of the form rec(S, T, degree, level, name)
ManSection.Description: Constructs a list of all irreps of \mathrm{SL}_2(\mathbb{Z}) that are exactly the given degree.

ManSection.Returns: a list of records of the form rec(S, T, degree, level, name)
ManSection.Description: Constructs a list of all irreps of \mathrm{SL}_2(\mathbb{Z}) that are at most the given degree.

ManSection.Returns: a list of records of the form rec(S, T, degree, level, name)
ManSection.Description: Constructs a list of all irreps of \mathrm{SL}_2(\mathbb{Z}) with level exactly p^\lambda.

ManSection.Returns: a list of records of the form rec(S, T, degree, level, name)
ManSection.Description: Constructs a list of the 18 exceptional irreps of \mathrm{SL}_2(\mathbb{Z}).
